data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E., 18Th October, 2023
data.news_body:
Pursuant to provisions of Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e., 18th October, 2023, inter alia, considered and approved the Un-audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2023 along with the Limited Review Report of the Auditors thereon.

The meeting commenced at 1.00 P.M. and concluded at 7.00 P.M.

data.caption: Financial Results For March 31, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements)
Regulations 2015, we enclose herewith the Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial
Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2021 along with Auditors'
Report thereon.
There was no qualified opinion expressed by the statutory auditors in their report on the
Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results and hence the Statement of Impact on Audit
Qualifications on the Financial Results being inapplicable is not attached.
Please take this on record.
